# Government Tender Announcement

## Title

* English Title: Tender for Security System Maintenance and Preventative Maintenance Services
* French Title: April de maintenance et de maintenance préventive sur le système de sécurité

## Tender Information

* Reference Number: CB-693-81100998
* Solicitation Number: 2024-00799
* Tender Status: Open
* Closing Date and Time: 25 November 2024, 16:00
* Procurement Method: Competitive – Open Bidding
* Trade Agreements: Various (Please refer to the tender documents)

## Tender Description

The Canadian Food Inspection Agency is seeking a service provider for the repair and preventative maintenance of its Physical Security Access Control System at its Nepean, Ontario laboratory.

The successful bidder will be required to provide a scheduled preventative maintenance program and as-and-when needed repairs on an on-call basis.

A mandatory site visit is required for all bidders. Prior to the site visit date, bidders must inform the Contracting Authority to confirm attendance and provide the name(s) of the person(s) who will attend.

## Key Dates

* Publication Date: 29 October 2024
* Tender Closing Date: 25 November 2024, 16:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: 29 November 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: 31 March 2026

## Procurement Category

* SRVTGD (Security and Protective Services)

## Regions of Opportunity

* Canada

## Regions of Delivery

* National Capital Region (NCR)

## Contact Information

* Name: Peter Vinh
* Email: peter.vinh@inspection.gc.ca
* Phone: (343) 573-4194

## Tender Documents

* Request for Proposal: 2024-00799-RFP.zip
* Amendment Notice: None
* Notice of Public Procurement: 2024-00799-NNP.pdf

Attachments can be found on the Canadabuys website.

Note: All attachments and documents are available on the Canadabuys website. Bidders are required to register for an account to access the documents.
